comments.comment: Gihiyahei pawiddagei wenasa hodata pennala dunna hamuduruwo.dakka neda ranjanta nambu nama deepu widiya.aththatama meya budda puthrayekda? Budun sarana yana kenekda ? Apagatha wenawa neda pawiddekuka muwin gihiyanta thirisanunge nama kiyana kota ranjan waradimai kiyamu ekata fathers latath apahasa karanawa.ranjan katholika agam nayakayekda  agama adala ganna.balannako kelinma wairaya paliganeema thamath oya bikshuwa kiyana ayage hithe thiyenne.buduhamuduruwo desu darmayada oya? Unwahanse keles nasana hati awaboda karala dunna misak keles athi kale naha hamuduru kenek unath janawala waradak thiyenne.oya fatherslata mona widiyata bannath apahasa kalath mokada wadagath ugath minisun ekata eka karanne maha randu karamme naha ranjan waradak kala ekaya banna denawanam daduwamak dun a eka ethanin iwarai mokakda me karume maick ekak dakkoth duwala gihilla wachala kamata kawahary sofana ekamai karanne.meyala baba kiyana katin neda hama apahasayakma karanne. Aththatama hofa sil rakina hamuduruwantath awanambuwak oya karanne.ballo biruwata kadu pahath wennenaha hamuduruwane eka hodata mathaka tiya ganna.kisidaka katholika agame piya thumanlawa gawaganna epa mokada opa doopa allapa sallapaye yedenne naha eyala .
comments.author: Judy Kulathunga
